name: Palladio Definer Contour and Highlight Palette, Perfect for Sculpting Facial Features, Blendable Satin Finish Colors, 6 shades for Contouring and Highlighting, Compact Powder with Mirror
short_description: WHAT IS IT: This carefully curated palette features six talc-free shades, including three contour shades for defining and sculpting your features and three highlight shades for adding luminosity and dimension.

FORMULATION/ BENEFITS: Formulated with high-quality ingredients, including botanical extracts and nourishing aloe, chamomile, coconut oil, and hyaluronic acid, this palette offers a smooth application and comfortable wear experience.
HOW TO USE: For a naturally sculpted look, apply the contour shade along the hollows of your cheeks, jawline, and sides of the nose using a fluffy brush, blending well for a seamless finish.
BOTANICAL AND VITAMIN INFUSED COSMETICS: It's vegan, gluten-free, paraben-free & cruelty-free, ensuring that no animals are harmed in the manufacturing process.

CLEAN BEAUTY: We believe that what you put on your body is as important as what you put in it. Our products are saturated with vitamins and powerful botanicals to help nourish your skin. We are 100% Paraben and Cruelty-free Leaping Bunny certified.

name: Black Radiance True Complexion Contour Palette, Dark To Deep
short_description: READY, SET, CONTOUR: Black Radiance True Complexion Contour Palette highlights, shapes, & sculpts facial features for naturally enhanced definition. Create the perfect foundation for your look.
CONTOUR PALETTE: Sculpt, define, & highlight your best features & achieve a look that's perfect for your skin tone. Our set of blendable shades lets you customize foundation, highlighter, & bronzer.
LOVE YOUR SHADE: For more than two decades, Black Radiance has pursued its vision to be the expert & resource for black beauty. We have a wide range of cosmetics for darker skin tones.

EMPOWERED BEAUTY: Black Radiance combines high style with the latest technology, offering exclusively formulated foundations, concealers, highlighters, eye & lip colors for a diverse range of skin tones.

BLACK BEAUTY MATTERS: We enable women of color around the world to be even more beautiful. Black Radiance highlights the strength & beauty of today’s black women with a portfolio of luxurious, affordable cosmetics.
product_description: First prep the face with True Complexion Refining Skin Primer for the best contouring effects. Use a large powder brush to gently buff the Contour powder to the areas you want to define. Use a smaller brush to apply the Sculpt powder to the top of cheekbones to make them stand out. Then, with the same or different brush of your choosing, brush the Highlighter onto the apples of your cheeks for a healthy pop of color.

product_description: Butta bronze, butta blend, butta boom. Buttermelt Bronzer blends like powder and glides on like butta for a sun soaked bronze all year round that lasts all day long. See up to 12 hours of wear in 8 buttalicous true-to-skin shades infused with mango butter, shea butter, and almond butter. To bring the heat, use our Buttermelt Bronzer Brush to sweep Buttermelt Bronzer on starting from the temple, across the cheek and along the jawline.
